check.name: download_keepDownloadLog
check.label: Keep a log of downloaded files
check.tooltip: Useful for when you like to rename files after downloading them.

check.name: download_prettyFilenames
check.label: Pretty filenames
check.tooltip: Will make filenames more readable by removing some HTML escape sequences. (non-displayable characters and those forbidden in filenames will be left escaped)

check.name: download_sameFolder
check.label: Output all to same folder
check.tooltip: Useful for sites that use a hash folder system

check.name: download_dateSubfolder
check.label: Separate runs by date
check.tooltip: Will use the run date as the root folder

check.name: download_usePageDomain
check.label: Use page's domain
check.tooltip: Will use the page's domain instead of the file's.

check.name: download_usePageDirectory
check.label: Use the page's directory
check.tooltip: Will store the file as if it was in the page's directory.

check.name: download_prependPage
check.label: Prepend page name to file name
check.tooltip: File x.png found on page y.html will be named y_x.png

check.name: download_ppAsDir
check.label: As folder
check.tooltip: File x.png found on page y.html will be named y\x.png

check.name: download_alternateNumbering
check.label: Numbered File Names
check.tooltip: Uses a number scheme to name files. ####_### (pageNum_fileNum). Useful when sites give files non-sense names that throw off order.

check.name: download_sameSite
check.label: Same site only
check.tooltip: File's domain must match the page's domain.
